entries.text: The Demon Slayer Corps is a private organization that hunts demons under a leader, with elite swordsmen called Hashira.
Hashira (Pillars) are the Corps’ top swordsmen; each represents a breathing style specialty and commands squads.
Breathing Styles are sword arts that enhance physical ability using focused breathing; core styles include Water, Flame, Wind, Thunder, Stone, and derivatives.
Sun Breathing (Hinokami Kagura) is the original style from which others branched; it emphasizes relentless, rhythmic forms.
Nichirin blades are forged from sunlight-absorbing ore; blade color changes with the wielder and affects combat characteristics.
Muzan Kibutsuji is the progenitor of demons; his blood creates demons and empowers the Twelve Kizuki.
The Twelve Kizuki are Muzan’s strongest demons divided into Upper and Lower Moons; they wield distinct Blood Demon Arts.
Final Selection is the Corps’ survival test on Mount Fujikasane where candidates must endure demon attacks to qualify.
Tanjiro Kamado joins the Corps to cure his sister Nezuko; begins with Water Breathing and later learns Hinokami Kagura forms.
Nezuko Kamado is turned into a demon yet retains protective instincts; she fights using demonic strength and Blood Demon Art flames.
The Mugen (Infinity) Train incident involves a demon manipulating dreams; Rengoku plays a pivotal role defending passengers.
